author: Reuters Editorial
title: REFILE-BRIEF-India Seeks Fresh Bids To Sell Majority Stake in State-Run Chopper Service Provider Pawan Hans
text:
(Refiles to add missing word in second bullet)
April 13 (Reuters) -
* INDIA SEEKS FRESH BIDS TO SELL MAJORITY IN STATE-RUN CHOPPER SERVICE PROVIDER PAWAN HANS
* EXPRESSION OF INTEREST INVITED LATEST BY JUNE 11, 2018 * DOCUMENT HERE bit.ly/2EJqs9x
